name: intensely
content:

C2 extremely or strongly: His strongest criticism is reserved for his father, whom he disliked intensely. This book is intensely personal.
C2 in a very serious way that shows strong emotions or opinions: My mother stood us up and looked at us intensely for a minute. "I give you my word," she said intensely. See
intense
More examplesFewer examplesShe is enjoying the course intensely.They were intensely loyal to the president.He is an intensely private, withdrawn man.The itching can be intensely painful.The star is intensely hot.He defended her intensely to her critics.
